question.text: After poaching 3 lions in a certain forest of Gujarat, only 15 are left in a year. Determine the death rate per capita.

solution.text: Certain attributes are for a population and are not applicable to individuals. Birth rate and death rate are two such attributes. Birth rate is the number of births taking place in a given population in a given period of time. Similarly Death rate is the number of deaths occurring in a population in a given period of time. Death rate can be calculated as Number of deaths/Total population. In the given example Number of Deaths is 3 and the total population during that period will be  <math><mn>18</mn><mi> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mn>15</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> . Therefore the death rate is  <math><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>18</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.166</mn></math>
